snippet: Following a riot in Nauru and the first arrival of a vessel under the new policy, senior officials stood firm on the choice to send all asylum seekers who arrive by boat to Papua New Guinea.
lead_paragraph: Following a riot in Nauru and the first arrival of a vessel under the new policy, senior officials stood firm on the choice to send all asylum seekers who arrive by boat to Papua New Guinea.

headline.main: Australia Defends New Refugee Policy, Despite Riot
